docs.snippet: Less than 24 hours after Hakeem Nicks, a former Giants receiver, agreed to a one-year deal with the Indianapolis Colts, he said he was so confident in his skills that it was an easy decision....
docs.lead_paragraph: Less than 24 hours after Hakeem Nicks, a former Giants receiver, agreed to a one-year deal with the Indianapolis Colts, he said he was so confident in his skills that it was an easy decision.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; wide receiver Hakeem Nicks, leaving New York Giants for a one-year deal with the Indianapolis Colts, says he is so confident in his skills that decision was an easy one; other football news noted.

docs.snippet: The Big East commissioner says an Atlantic Coast Conference tournament in Brooklyn would be good for her league, which is remaking itself after several tumultuous seasons....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Big East commissioner says an Atlantic Coast Conference tournament in Brooklyn would be good for her league, which is remaking itself after several tumultuous seasons.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column; Big East commissioner Val Ackerman says she does not feel threatened by plans to bring the Atlantic Coast Conference men's basketball tournament to Brooklyn's Barclay's Center in 2017 and 2018; holds that market is large enough that the ACC tournament will not detract from Big East competition at Madison Square Garden.

headline.main: Rebuilt Big East Sees Room for a Rival Conference’s Tournament

docs.snippet: WuShock is among the most distinctive and odd members of the sports mascot kingdom: It’s an anthropomorphic shock of wheat....
docs.lead_paragraph: WuShock is among the most distinctive and odd members of the sports mascot kingdom: It’s an anthropomorphic shock of wheat.
docs.abstract: Wichita State Shockers mascot is a 7-foot-tall anthropomorphic shock of wheat named WuShock; 34-0 men's basketball team's quest for an undefeated season will be one of the highlights of the NCAA tournament, and it will give one of the oddest and most beloved members of the mascot kingdom plenty of face time on national television.

headline.main: The Pride of Wichita State, Whatever It May Actually Be

docs.snippet: In its recall crisis, General Motors is doing what many scandal-plagued companies do. It’s trying to manage the problem with an internal investigation....
docs.lead_paragraph: In its recall crisis, General Motors is doing what many scandal-plagued companies do. It’s trying to manage the problem with an internal investigation.
docs.abstract: General Motors, facing recall crisis, has hired law firms King & Spalding and Jenner & Block to conduct an internal investigation into why company failed for more than a decade to alert regulators and consumers to the defect; move is both a public-relations gambit and a legal strategy.

headline.main: As Scandal Unfolds, G.M. Calls In the Lawyers
